# f5distributedcloud_rbac_policy (Data Source)

Fetches information about an existing F5 Distributed Cloud RBAC Policy.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the RBAC policy to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the RBAC policy exists.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the RBAC policy.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the RBAC policy.
